when i was just a boy my granddaddy took me to town one afternoon he drove an ltd wore a big white stetson and two tone cowboy boots he said son here it goes and he handed me a twenty just to see the look on my face he said dont tell your mama nothing about it dont spend it all in one place you see it takes folding money to get the deal done folding money to have a little fun folding money to pay a few bills eat a steak dinner and cure a couple ills folding money you need a little stash greenback dollars and cold hard cash save it for a rainy day or go away a little bit son it takes folding money to get the deal done now ever since the day i learned to earn a dollar ive been taking his advice to heart cause when a man finds the courage to keep his cash some romance is bound to start now romance is just like money you can always get more if youve got it and let me tell you friends im a lot more handsome with a see note in my pocket you see it takes folding money to get the deal done folding money to have a little fun folding money to pay a few bills to take a girl dancing and cure a couple ills folding money you need a little stash greenback dollars and cold hard cash save it for a rainy day or go away a little bit son it takes folding money its a pain in the back its a cold hard fact gets to everybody sooner or later you can give it to a charity and in some disparity stock up your refrigerator itll kill you if you let it you can blow it with nothing to show it will make your wallet fatter but the truth of the matters cant take it with you when you go better spend a little folding money to get the deal done folding money to have a little fun folding money to pay a few bills spread a little round and cure a couple ills folding money you need a little stash greenback dollars and cold hard cash save it for a rainy day or go away a little bit son it takes folding money to get the deal done folding money folding money

it was four in the morning tears down my face i chose to call it time i tried hard for you baby no one else mattered id hoped that wed be fine as i walked down the hallway debris falling feels like the end of time i need to wash away the hours i cried last night i cannot wait for the rain to remove this lovers pain i cannot wait for the rain to come and fill me up again were you scared when i went away did it cross your mind i was just as broken you remain underneath the dust now the very worst hasnt gone unspoken i just cried i only loved once you were my whole life now youre confined to my darkest memories i need to wash away the hours i cried last night i cannot wait for the rain to remove this lovers pain i cannot wait for the rain to come and fill me up again i cannot wait for the rain to dissolve a lovers flame i cannot wait for the rain to make a woman of me again pour me a drink man bring it over here i dont want no ice im already cold enough now in our last days i would lie with you and you would never even sensed the end was coming soon im trying but it hurts like mad baby what you doing now acting like you dont even care that the world outside is broken down and my lungs have no air i cannot wait for the rain i cannot wait for the rain to make a woman of me again
